narrative_directives.action: Drusilla attempts to mediate between Varo and her husband through intermediaries, trying to reduce tensions that threaten her double game. She meets Varo privately, urging restraint, positioning herself as a voice of reason. But Varo sees through the attempt—he blames her for divided loyalties and makes veiled threats.
